statements: SELECT * FROM investment_banks;
SELECT client_name, deal_description FROM investment_banks;
SELECT client_id, deal_id, research_report_id FROM investment_banks WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM investment_banks ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, deal_description FROM investment_banks WHERE research_report_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, deal_description FROM investment_banks;
SELECT * FROM investment_banks WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, client_name, deal_description FROM investment_banks WHERE research_report_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_id, client_name, research_report_text FROM investment_banks ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, deal_id, research_report_text FROM investment_banks WHERE deal_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_location FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_location = 'New York';
SELECT deal_id, deal_amount, deal_date FROM deals ORDER BY deal_date DESC;
SELECT c.client_name, d.deal_amount FROM clients c JOIN deals d ON c.client_id = d.client_id WHERE d.deal_amount > 10000;
SELECT client_name, client_location FROM clients WHERE client_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM deals WHERE deal_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY deal_amount DESC;
SELECT client_name, deal_amount FROM clients INNER JOIN deals ON clients.client_id = deals.client_id WHERE deal_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM deals WHERE deal_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 AND client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT client_name, SUM(deal_amount) AS total_deal_amount FROM clients INNER JOIN deals ON clients.client_id = deals.client_id GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_deal_amount > 50000 ORDER BY total_deal_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientRelationships;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientRelationships WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT deal_name, deal_amount FROM Deals WHERE deal_id = 3;
SELECT report_title, author_name, report_date FROM ResearchReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM ClientRelationships WHERE client_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM ClientRelationships WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientRelationships WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT deal_name, deal_type, deal_amount FROM Deals WHERE deal_amount > 10000;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientRelationships JOIN Deals ON ClientRelationships.client_id = Deals.deal_id;
SELECT * FROM ResearchReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_contact FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT deal_name, deal_date FROM deals ORDER BY deal_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_type FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Financial';
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_contact FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, deal_date FROM deals WHERE deal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_type, LEFT(report_content, 50) AS short_content FROM reports;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_position, employee_department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_department DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, industry FROM clients WHERE industry='Technology';
SELECT client_name, client_type FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM deals WHERE deal_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='Sales' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT client_name, industry FROM clients;
SELECT * FROM deals WHERE deal_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY deal_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_content FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' AND report_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments ORDER BY no_of_employees DESC;
